title: Clypeostoma nortoni
content:
Clypeostoma nortoni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Chilodontaidae.[1][2]

It generally lives in tropical environments.[3]  Its mineralized skeleton contains calcium carbonate.[4]

This marine species occurs in the Indo-West Pacific.

This Chilodontaidae-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
